column9: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2021
column14: Love all these colors. They last a very long time too. When it gets too dry just add a little lip gloss (I use carmex) to your lip. Very beautiful. The Wild Fire is a very saturated hot red. It's very seeeeeexyyyy. I've been using these colors for years.

column6: Worst lipstick I have ever used.
column9: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2018
column14: I was super excited about this color.  I put one coat on & it didn't cover at all, went to add a second coat & it just peeled the first layer off & looked way worse. Washed my lips & tired again with a lip primer. No dice. Looked just as bad. Left if on to see if it was at least durable. 20 minutes late & it looked like I was wearing only lip liner. This is as cheap as the price. I prefer my NYX, Atleast that stuff goes on nicely & stays put.

column6: A Little Too Purple-y for Me
column9: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2022
column14: The consistency of this lipstick is great - it goes on smoothly and has lots of staying power.  I was looking for something a little more pinky-mauve, and this color on my lips looks much more purple.  Still a pretty color, just not for me.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2021
column14: This product is very watery for matte liquid lipstick. Did not apply evenly. Had to apply many layers and after all that effort, it came off very easily after one sip of a drink. I was very disappointed in this product because I was excited with all the colors. Unless it was the one I received, I would not recommend this.

column6: RubyKisses has a website that has other amazing lip brands but this particular product can't be purchased there.
column9: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2018
column14: This is my favorite matte lipstick brand. I tried my first one which was that classic Instagram Mauve Pink. Id been searching for that color forever and it either was too bright for my complexion or was sold out from everywhere. I purchased the mauve from my local beauty supply store that actually had many of the brands colors. I didnt want to go back to the beautysupply so i found the brand online. I hate that you can't purchase them directly from their site though.but these are the best with amazing colors!!!

column9: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2019
column14: This item is overpriced. No different than rest, and it's my last time listening to a You Tuber.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2021
column14: The dark colors stay on long, even after eating. You might have to add a tab bit after spicy food. The light colors don't stay on as long as the dark colors. The colors are just Amazing......

column9: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2021
column14: I did not like it this product because i applied the product and does not work ,do not buy is very sticky and does not cover the lips does not matter how much you apply
